question: Do you have any hereditary conditions/diseases?
Which statement best describes your cigarette smoking status?
options: I smoke now but have cut down
I recently quit smoking* but I have smoked in the past 30 days
I have never smoked* or have smoked less than 100 cigarettes in my lifetime
eligibleFields: I smoke now but have cut down
I recently quit smoking* but I have smoked in the past 30 days
